definitions.text: a piece of land where waste materials are dumped
(computer science) a copy of the contents of a computer storage device; sometimes used in debugging programs
a place where supplies can be stored
sever all ties with, usually unceremoniously or irresponsibly
examples: The company dumped him after many years of service
She dumped her boyfriend when she fell in love with a rich man

definitions.text: drop (stuff) in a heap or mass
examples: The truck dumped the garbage in the street
It plunged to the bottom of the well
